::DarkMouse::
She grabbed Inferno by his shoulder. "Hold on a second. What do you 
mean Megatron is dead? How could he die? I don't know what you are 
talking about. Fill me in here huh? And I can't go back to Black 
Aracnia.  I got seperated and by now, she thinks I deserted her or 
something.  I don't want to get slagged ok.  Not tell me what 
happened to Megatron?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> Inferno glared at Darkmouse, "I know you! The royalty....Black 
> Aracnai....Megatron is dead! Its all coming back to me! Come, we 
must report 
> to Black Aracniaat once!" He began to march back to base.
